title: APT / STEBAN barks
description: Steban's barks in the underground reading room

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That girl from my seminar *promise..."
dialogueTree.english: "That girl from my seminar *promised* she would stop by."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Theory is the poetry of thought.""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Maurice and Zuzanna will be back,..."
dialogueTree.english: "Maurice and Zuzanna will be back, I know it."
dialogueTree.polish: „Maurice i Zuzanna wrócą. Ja to wiem”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Маўрыс і Сюзанна вернуцца. Я гэта ведаю".

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Who the hell took my jacket?""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Kind of chilly tonight, Uli.""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Puncher and Wattmann should be req..."
dialogueTree.english: "Puncher and Wattmann should be required reading."
dialogueTree.polish: „Dzieło Punchera i Wattmanna powinno być lekturą obowiązkową”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Твор Панчэра і Ватмана павінен быць абавязковай літаратурай".

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""The only 'class' I care about is t..."
dialogueTree.english: "The only 'class' I care about is the working class."
dialogueTree.polish: „Jedyna klasa, która mnie interesuje, to klasa robotnicza”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Адзіны клас, які мяне цікавіць, гэта рабочы клас".

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""If infra-materialism is wrong, I d..."
dialogueTree.english: "If infra-materialism is wrong, I don't want to be right."
dialogueTree.polish: „Jeśli inframaterializm się myli, to nie chcę mieć racji”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Калі інфраматэрыялізм памыляецца, то я не хачу мець рацыю".

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""My grades are trash this semester.""
dialogueTree.polish: „Moje oceny w tym semestrze są beznadziejne”.

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""We're the only real communists lef..."
Steban, the Student Communist: ""An interesting point, Uli.""
